notification_settings.title: Notification settings
notification_settings.edit_in_console: You can change your notification settings <2>on this page</2>. We will soon move it here.

edit_preferences.title: Notification Settings
edit_preferences.description: You may still receive important notifications about your account and content outside of your preferred notification settings.

host_request.create: Someone sends you a host request
host_request.message: Someone sends a message in a host request
host_request.missed_messages: You miss messages in a host request

chat.missed_messages: You miss messages in a chat

reference.receive_hosted: You receive a reference from someone who hosted you
reference.receive_surfed: You receive a reference from someone you hosted
reference.receive_friend: You received a reference from a friend
reference.reminder_hosted: Reminder to write a reference to someone you hosted
reference.reminder_surfed: Reminder to write a reference to someone you surfed with

friend_request.create: Someone sends you a friend request

event.create_approved: An event that is approved by the moderators is created in your community
event.create_any: A user creates any event in your community (not checked by an admin)
event.update: An event you are attending is updated
event.cancel: An event you are attending is cancelled
event.delete: An event you are attending is deleted
event.invite_organizer: Someone invites you to co-organize an event
event.comment: A user comments on an event you are going to

onboarding.reminder: Reminder to complete your profile after signing up

badge.add: A badge is added to your account
badge.remove: A badge is removed from your account

api_key.create: An API key is created for your account

gender.change: The gender displayed on your profile is changed

discussion.create: Someone creates a discussion in a community you are in
discussion.comment: Someone comments on a discussion you are following

push_notifications.title: Push Notifications
push_notifications.description: You can enable push notifications for Couchers.org on your device. We are working on expanding this feature.
push_notifications.allow_push: Click the 'Allow' button in your browser popup to enable push notifications.
push_notifications.error_generic: Error during subscription to push notifications
push_notifications.error_unsupported: Push notifications or Service Workers are not supported in this browser.

permission_denied.platform_settings_description: Still having issues after enabling notifications in your browser? You may need to adjust your platform settings.

instructions.chrome: You've blocked notifications. Please enable notifications in your browser settings to continue. In Chrome, click on the padlock icon in the URL bar, then adjust the "Notifications" setting.
instructions.firefox: You've blocked notifications. Please enable notifications in your browser settings to continue. In Firefox, go to Preferences > Privacy & Security > Permissions > Notifications, and modify the website's permission.
instructions.safari: You've blocked notifications. Please enable notifications in your browser settings to continue. In Safari, go to Preferences > Websites > Notifications to modify permissions.
instructions.generic: You've blocked notifications. Please enable notifications in your browser settings to continue.
instructions.macos: In macOS, go to System Settings > Notifications, and modify the app's permission.
instructions.windows: In Windows, go to Settings > System > Notifications & actions, and adjust the app or website's permission.

linux.gnome: In GNOME, go to Settings > Notifications to adjust the app's permission.
linux.kde: In KDE, go to System Settings > Notifications to modify permissions.

mobile.browser: In your mobile browser settings, adjust the notifications permission for this website.
mobile.os: In your mobile device notification settings, adjust the permissions to allow notifications.
